scripts.docker:tag-master: npm run docker:build && docker tag sudowing/service-engine:develop sudowing/service-engine:master
scripts.docker:tag-latest: npm run docker:build && docker tag sudowing/service-engine:develop sudowing/service-engine:latest
scripts.docker:tag-release: npm run docker:build && docker tag sudowing/service-engine:develop sudowing/service-engine:v0.0.3
scripts.docker:push-master: npm run docker:tag-master && docker push sudowing/service-engine:master
scripts.docker:push-latest: npm run docker:tag-latest && docker push sudowing/service-engine:latest
scripts.docker:push-release: npm run docker:tag-release && docker push sudowing/service-engine:v0.0.3
